title: Cape, second half 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal sequins, paillettes
Technique: embroidery on satin weave; lined with twill
description: Small cape for an ecclesiatic figure, the "Bambino". Pale blue satin embroidered with glass beads, paillettes, and gold and colored sequins. Small flowers sprinkled over ground. Edges in twining lead and flower design. Lined with red silk twill.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cape, second half 18th century.Medium: silk, metal sequins, paillettes
Technique: embroidery on satin weave; lined with twill. 1899-2-3.
